lead_paragraph: KELLY--Ellsworth. The Board of Trustees and Staff of World Monuments Fund mourn the passing of Ellsworth Kelly, husband of our trustee Jack Shear. Ellsworth, along with Jack and the Ellsworth Kelly Foundation, was for years a deeply committed champion of preserving the world's most treasured places, with a passion for supporting the crafts-people and skills vital to heritage conservation. We all will greatly miss him. Christopher Ohrstrom, Chairman, and Joshua David, President and CEO, World Monuments Fund 1/3
